text: Yo pana bhikkhu evarūpāni paṇītabhojanāni agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya pācittiyaṃ
edit: Yo pana bhikkhu evarūpāni paṇītabhojanāni agilāno attano atthāya viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya pācittiyaṃ

translations.transtext: Should any bhikkhu who is not ill, having requested finer staple foods such as these for his own sake, thenconsume them, it is to be confessed.
ภิกษุใด มิใช่ผู้อาพาธขอโภขนะอันประณีตเห็นปานนี้ เพื่อประโยชน์แก่ตนแล้วฉัน เป็นปาจิตตีย์
Should any bhikkhu who is not sick having asked for such fine foods for his own use consume them, it entails expiation.
